medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset bilateral lower abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at 4 AM with acute onset of bilateral lower abdominal pain that worsened throughout the day. The patient also reported nausea without vomiting. Bowel movements occurred last the morning of transfer. No fever, chills, or other significant symptoms were noted.
medical_history.family_history: Father's side - melanoma; mother's side - heart disease; mother and sister have Factor V Leiden.
